regional_bands._description: This file contains custom regional frequency band definitions that extend the built-in ISM and Amateur Radio bands. Copy this file to your device's SPIFFS filesystem as 'regional_bands.json'.
regional_bands._instructions: 1. Customize the bands below for your region, 2. Remove bands you don't need, 3. Set 'enabled': false to disable a band, 4. Upload to device SPIFFS using PlatformIO or other tools

_usage_instructions.upload_method_1: PlatformIO: Use 'pio run --target uploadfs' to upload data folder
_usage_instructions.upload_method_2: ESP32 Sketch Data Upload: Use Arduino IDE plugin
_usage_instructions.upload_method_3: Manual: Copy file to SPIFFS partition using esptool or web interface
_usage_instructions.file_location: Must be named 'regional_bands.json' in SPIFFS root directory
_usage_instructions.validation: Use 'lora bands' command to verify bands loaded correctly
_usage_instructions.customization: Edit bands above, remove unneeded entries, adjust for your region
